title: Priyanka Chopra cuts Victorian chic look in floral at Power Business Managers Breakfast in LA
text:
Priyanka Chopra has had a steady rise to fame in the US, following a successful career in Bollywood.

But behind every successful woman is another successful woman, which Chopra honored recently.

She cut a Victorian chic look Thursday as she joined her manager Lou Taylor at The Hollywood Reporter's Power Business Managers Breakfast in Los Angeles.

Victorian chic: Priyanka Chopra cut a Victorian chic look Thursday at The Hollywood Reporter's Power Business Managers Breakfast in Los Angeles

Chopra donned a gorgeous ankle-length dress, printed throughout with beautiful pastel florals.

The number featured a ruffled collar with more ruffles running down the long sleeves.

She belted the look with wide black alligator skin in a gold buckle, for a stunning silhouette.

The ensemble was completed with a pair of brown strappy stilettos, revealing a blush pedicure to match her fresh manicure.

Floral fierce: She donned a gorgeous ankle-length dress, printed throughout with beautiful pastel florals

Stunning silhouette: She belted the look with wide black alligator skin in a gold buckle, for a stunning silhouette

Best manager ever: She showed her support for manager Lou Taylor, who was honored with this year's Business Manager Icon

Schmoozing it up: Chopra was also spotted chatting with The Hollywood Reporter editorial director Matthew Belloni

She showed her support for Taylor, who was honored with this year's Business Manager Icon.

Chopra was also spotted chatting with The Hollywood Reporter editorial director Matthew Belloni.

The 37-year-old has recently been promoting her return to Bollywood, with the film The Sky Is Pink.

She stars in the movie about a love story spanning 25 years, told by the couple's deceased daughter.

It's based on the true story and family of Aisha Chaudhary, a young motivational speaker who died of pulmonary fibrosis in 2015.

Chopra recently donned a stunning flowy velvet teal turtleneck jumpsuit to promote the film on The View.
description: The 37-year-old has recently been promoting her return to Bollywood, with the film The Sky Is Pink. She stars in the love story spanning 25 years, told by the couple's deceased daughter.
